metadata.synopsis:
This occurs when Mayrina dies. There are multiple permutationinlcuding, but not limited to, you killed her brothers and/or her husband, she knows that one or more of these people are dead but doesn't blame you, you took her husband as a summon, and you know one of the brothers is dead but she doesn't hold you responsible. 

Sad and far away sound - except in parts when she knows you killed her family.

9.speaker: Mayrina
9.context: InternalNodeContext: Brothers dead, husband killed by players, Mayrina does not know this player has killed her brothers, or this player indeed had nothing to do with that.NodeContext: Spitting with rage but also on the brink of tears. This player murdered your husband in cold blood.

27.speaker: Player
27.text: How long were you and Connor together?

42.speaker: Player
42.text: Was going to the hag worth it?

91.speaker: Mayrina
91.text: My fault... everyone dead... because of me. I'm... cursed.

45.speaker: Narrator
45.text: *The spell's power wanes. You can ask no more questions.*

16.speaker: Mayrina
16.context: InternalNodeContext: She doesn't know anything about either her husband or her brothers being dead (they might be dead, but if so she doesn't know)NodeContext: Fighting back tears. You sound very young and scared.

53.speaker: Mayrina
53.text: My big brothers... dead... my fault... my...

6.speaker: Narrator
6.text: *The spell's power wanes. You can ask no more questions.*

31.speaker: Mayrina
31.context: InternalNodeContext: She doesn't know anything about either her husband or her brothers being dead (they might be dead, but if so she doesn't know)NodeContext: Fighting back tears. You sound very young and scared.

47.speaker: Narrator
47.text: *The spell's power wanes. You can ask no more questions.*

41.speaker: Narrator
41.text: *The corpse seems willing to speak - but not to its killer.*
41.context: InternalNodeContext: Brothers dead, husband killed by players, Mayrina knows this player killed brothers.NodeContext: Spitting with rage but also on the brink of tears. This player killed people you loved.

46.speaker: Narrator
46.text: *The corpse does not stir. It will answer no more questions.*
46.context: InternalNodeContext: Brothers dead, husband killed by players, Mayrina knows this player killed brothers.NodeContext: Spitting with rage but also on the brink of tears. This player killed people you loved.

51.speaker: Mayrina
51.context: InternalNodeContext: Brothers dead, husband killed by players, Mayrina knows this player killed brothers.NodeContext: Spitting with rage but also on the brink of tears. This player killed people you loved.

102.speaker: Player
102.text: Why did you come to the teahouse?

69.speaker: Mayrina
69.text: Ethel... bring husband... bring back... my Connor.

14.speaker: Player
14.text: Was going to the hag worth it?

89.speaker: Player
89.text: What drove you to give up your baby?

84.speaker: Narrator
84.text: *The spell's power wanes. You can ask no more questions.*

74.speaker: Mayrina
74.context: InternalNodeContext: Brothers dead, husband turned into summon, Mayrina does not know this player has killed her brothers, or this player indeed had nothing to do with that.NodeContext: Spitting with rage but also on the brink of tears. This player took your husband and made him a slave.

20.speaker: Player
20.text: What can you tell me about your husband?

35.speaker: Mayrina
35.text: ... been together... since we were kids... loved him... more than anything.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Was going to the hag worth it?

44.speaker: Mayrina
44.text: Yes... but... urgh... ruined it. Ruined... everything...

26.speaker: Player
26.text: Why did you give up your baby?

78.speaker: Narrator
78.text: *The spell's power wanes. You can ask no more questions.*

88.speaker: Mayrina
88.context: InternalNodeContext: Brothers dead, husband turned into summon, Mayrina knows this player killed brothers.NodeContext: Spitting with rage but also on the brink of tears. This player killed people you loved.

93.speaker: Mayrina
93.context: InternalNodeContext: Doesn't know whether husband is dead or not, but knows that you killed her brothers.NodeContext: Spitting with rage but also on the brink of tears. This player killed people you loved.

76.speaker: Mayrina
76.text: ... drove me mad but... loved them... dead now... everyone is... dead.

56.speaker: Narrator
56.text: *The spell's power wanes. You can ask no more questions.*

97.speaker: Mayrina
97.context: InternalNodeContext: Brothers dead, husbanddead, Mayrina does not know this player has killed her brothers, or this player indeed had nothing to do with that.NodeContext: Your entire family is dead. You're lost and confused - sound very young and scared.

10.speaker: Player
10.text: What drove you to give up your child?

65.speaker: Mayrina
65.text: Ethel promised... raise the baby... be a good... mother.

80.speaker: Player
80.text: Did you know that Ethel was a hag?

70.speaker: Mayrina
70.text: Yes. But... she promised... promised to take care of... everything.

43.speaker: Narrator
43.text: *The spell's power wanes. You can ask no more questions.*
